Name: VR Pekin Royal Palace
About the game: Based on 3D and VR technology, simulation restores the mysterious royal palace of ancient Oriental. In the VR scene, watching and experienced various mysterious oriental ancient royal palace buildings in the VR scene. The scenes are elements such as lawn and trees. In virtual scenes, players can move. In the virtual scene, players can sightseen and browse your personal Oriental Royal Palace building. Gaming operation Left handle TouchPad is responsible for mobile and steering
